name: Nut Nibblers
description:
You are a squirrel.

Compete against AI squirrels and collect the biggest stash before winter comes!

HOW:
Bring nuts to shining home tree, throw them in by pressing Spacebar or Mouse.
Find more nuts with WASD.

Credits:
Juri Laitinen
Justin Granger
Jerkko Valta
Anna Topolova
Mitja Immonen
